npc:
Welcome to
NOSTALGIA, the
dream that
never ends!

The only way
to make this
dream end, is
to die.

Which, un-
fortunately,
is impossible
here.

They say there
is a portal
somewhere that
leads to another
dream.

A dream where
on can die...
chest:
You obtain
a pair of
"RUNNING
BOOTS"!

Hold down arrow
while on air
and press X
to perform an
"air dive"

You can use this
skill to break
blocks or cause
quakes that
stun enemies.

You obtain a
"ENDLESS BAG
OF PEBBLES"!

Press C to throw
them. They never
end!

When standing on
the ground, press
down arrow and
the jump button
to slide.

You obtain a
pair of
"TINY WINGS"!

Press and hold
X after jumping
to flap your
arms and mimic
flying.

It does not make
you fly, though,
just fall
more slowly.

Press X after the
first jump to
perform a double
jump.
locked:
The door is
locked. You
need a key
to unlock it.
open:
You use your
MASTER KEY to
unlock the door.
